results.deck: Formed by ex-employees of another Vancouver based studio, Radical Entertainment, in May 1998. It was bought by Rockstar Games in 2002 and transformed into Rockstar Vancouver.
results.description:
The company was founded as Barking Dog Studios, Ltd. in Gastown, Vancouver, British Columbia, by six ex-Radical Entertainment employees: Brian Thalken, Peter Grant, Sean Thompson, Christopher Mair, Glenn Barnes and Michael Gyori.

Barking Dog was bought by Rockstar Games in 2002 and renamed Rockstar Vancover.Â  The name Barking Dog Studios was then sold to a web site design company.
results.name: Barking Dog Studios, Ltd.

game.name: Disney's Treasure Planet: Battle at Procyon
